entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
